attributes.action: make banana consumption illegal in in enclosed public places.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel this outrage has been going on for too long. If people continue to consume the awfull amount of banans currently being eaten we will turn into apes like that film i saw on a coach. no longer shall this daylight crime been going oin it must be stopped!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
